title: Gifts From an Angel
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Hnn~~! It’s Buono~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fu fu, obviously! It’s Kasumin’s special roasted chicken bun, so of course it’s delicious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Try this strawberry jam bun too. It’s simple, but it tastes really good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>*Munch* *Munch*.... This one is also tasty~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>As expected of Kasumi-chan. I want to eat these everyday~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehehe~, please praise me more, Emma-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eating good bread really makes you happy, huh. To be able to make buns as delicious as these, you’re just like an angel that brings me happiness, Kasumi-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehehe, Kasumin is so cute that Kasumin is like an angel huh~~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ufufu, would the cute angel have lunch together with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
